app.name: FSDumper
app.long_description:
The application dumps all your files from your SLC and MLC to an SD card.
Usage: --------------------------------------------------------------------------
-prepare an SD card large enough to hold all the files. SLC is around 80MB and MLC depends on your usage of it.
-Assure there are no folders called usr or sys in the root of the SD card. The dumper won't overwrite any files.
-Load the supplied fw.img via the cfwbooter (http://wupinstaller.com/FSDumperv0.1-cred.rar)
-Load the FSDumper application via the HBL
-After the application is done you will find the SLC files in sd:/slc_sys and the MLC files in sd:/sys and sd:/usr
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
